about_the_game:
Adventures of Steve the Cat — this is a cozy adventure platformer-study, where you will play as a small and cute cat Steve, who is trying to defeat the professor and return to normal life, from which he was unexpectedly snatched when his friends were kidnapped. And although you are lost and puzzled, you have to overcome all kinds of dangers of the forest and other locations! The game will make you feel nostalgic for the old platforerms from childhood! A beautiful picture, convenient controls and beautiful music will not leave anyone indifferent!



You are a cute cat Steve, who has to go through a lot of beautiful, exciting and dangerous locations. On your way you are going to meet a lot of enemies created by a crazy professor. He steals animals and puts experiments on them. You have to fight him and save innocent animals from him. Jump, spin, crush your enemies!



Features:
  • Colorful graphics
  • Cute main character
  • 10 beautiful levels
  • Convenient and responsive gameplay

Will be added in the future
  • More levels
  • More enemies
  • Leaderboards
  • More achievements
